main.description: Official PCMT website - Patient Care Management Tool for health facilities

ProductOverview.Summary: PCMT (Patient Care Management Tool) is an open-source software designed to support patient care management and clinical workflow in health facilities.
ProductOverview.Description: PCMT provides tools for patient registration, care planning, progress tracking, and outcome monitoring. It is designed to support healthcare providers in delivering coordinated and quality patient care across different clinical settings.
ProductOverview.PrimaryFunctionality: Patient care management tool for clinical workflow and care coordination
ProductOverview.Users: Healthcare providers, nurses, care coordinators, and health facility administrators

Reach.SummaryOfReach: PCMT has been implemented in various health facilities to support patient care management and clinical workflow optimization.

Maturity.SummaryOfMaturity: All maturity model assessments are self-reported by the funded organization leading the development of the global good.

Community.DescriptionOfCommunity: PCMT is developed and maintained by a global community focused on patient care management and clinical workflow optimization.

HostAnchorOrganization.name: PCMT
HostAnchorOrganization.description: Open source patient care management tool

Sustainability.Description: PCMT is supported through open source development and community contributions.
